column5: This is a link to the Big River Walleye Classic that is being held on Delaronde Lake in NW Saskatchewan. It is being organized by Jim Chute who runs the Vanity Cup every year in the fall. If your familiar with the Vanity it`s one of North Americas largest and most Prestigious walleye tournaments. I have no doubt that the Big River tournament will be it`s equal. If your up for the challenge check out the website. http://www.bigriverwalleyeclassic.com/
